description: Merges two branches using the fast-forward merge strategy.

parameters.name: repositoryName
parameters.description: The name of the repository where you want to merge two branches.

parameters.name: sourceCommitSpecifier
parameters.description: The branch, tag, HEAD, or other fully qualified reference used to identify a commit (for example, a branch name or a full commit ID).

parameters.name: destinationCommitSpecifier
parameters.description: The branch, tag, HEAD, or other fully qualified reference used to identify a commit (for example, a branch name or a full commit ID).

nested_items.name: commitId
nested_items.description: The commit ID of the merge in the destination or target branch.

nested_items.name: treeId
nested_items.description: The tree ID of the merge in the destination or target branch.
